errors.cause: Workflow file not in correct location, wrong trigger, or branch filter mismatch

solutions.code:
# Workflow must be in .github/workflows/
mkdir -p .github/workflows
mv workflow.yml .github/workflows/

on:
  push:
    branches: [main, develop]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]

on:
  push:
    paths:
      - 'src/**'
      - '!**/*.md'  # Exclude docs

errors.cause: Insufficient GITHUB_TOKEN permissions or missing secrets

solutions.code:
permissions:
  contents: write
  pull-requests: write
  packages: write

# Settings -> Actions -> General
# Workflow permissions section

errors.cause: Authentication issue, LFS, or shallow clone limitation

solutions.code:
- uses: actions/checkout@v4
  with:
    fetch-depth: 0  # Full history

- uses: actions/checkout@v4
  with:
    lfs: true

errors.cause: Cache key mismatch or cache evicted

solutions.code:
- uses: actions/cache@v4
  with:
    path: ~/.npm
    key: npm-${{ hashFiles('**/package-lock.json') }}
    restore-keys: |
      npm-

# GitHub limits cache to 10GB per repo
# Older caches evicted when limit reached

# hashFiles() returns empty if files not found
# Ensure lock files are committed

errors.cause: Path not found, size limit exceeded, or permission issue

solutions.code:
- run: ls -la ./build/  # Verify path
- uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
  with:
    name: build-output
    path: ./build/

- uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
  with:
    name: logs
    path: ./logs/
    if-no-files-found: warn  # warn, error, ignore

- run: tar -czvf artifact.tar.gz ./large-directory/
- uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
  with:
    name: compressed-artifact
    path: artifact.tar.gz

errors.cause: Job exceeded 6-hour limit or step exceeded timeout

solutions.code:
jobs:
  build:
    timeout-minutes: 30

- name: Long running task
  timeout-minutes: 10
  run: ./slow-script.sh

strategy:
  matrix:
    shard: [1, 2, 3, 4]
# Split work across shards

errors.cause: Secret not defined, wrong scope, or fork limitation

solutions.code:
# Secrets not available in PRs from forks
if: github.event.pull_request.head.repo.full_name == github.repository

jobs:
  deploy:
    environment: production
    # Uses production environment secrets

errors.cause: Invalid matrix syntax or too many combinations

solutions.code:
strategy:
  matrix:
    os: [ubuntu-latest, windows-latest]
    node: [18, 20]
    exclude:
      - os: windows-latest
        node: 18

strategy:
  max-parallel: 4
  matrix:
    # ... (256 job limit)

strategy:
  matrix:
    include:
      - os: ubuntu-latest
        node: 20
        experimental: true
